input.sentences: [male] and his friend decided to head to vegas .
they stop at the grand canyon on the way there .
they find this ancient old rock and take a picture of it .
then a little crow flies by and lands on the road .
after that [male] takes a picture of the location location .
output.sentences: The rock formations of the desert are incredible.
It is nice to stop along the road and take in the beauty of the mountains.
If you are adventerous, it is fun to go on a hunt for some cool rocks.
The wildlife is plentiful so keep your eyes peeled as you travel through.
Don't forget to check out a few of the beautiful canyons the desert has to offer.
